34 /* Title : collision_check.cpp
35  * Project : moveit_servo
36  * Created : 1/11/2019
37  * Author : Brian O'Neil, Andy Zelenak, Blake Anderson

39 
40 #include <std_msgs/Float64.h>
41 
42 #include <moveit_servo/collision_check.h>
43 #include <moveit_servo/make_shared_from_pool.h>
44 
45 static const char LOGNAME[] = "collision_check";
46 static const double MIN_RECOMMENDED_COLLISION_RATE = 10;
47 constexpr double EPSILON = 1e-6; // For very small numeric comparisons
48 constexpr size_t ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD = 30; // Seconds to throttle logs inside loops
49 
50 namespace moveit_servo
51 {
52 // Constructor for the class that handles collision checking
53 CollisionCheck::CollisionCheck(ros::NodeHandle& nh, const moveit_servo::ServoParameters& parameters,
54  const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr& planning_scene_monitor)
55  : nh_(nh)
56  , parameters_(parameters)
57  , planning_scene_monitor_(planning_scene_monitor)
58  , self_velocity_scale_coefficient_(-log(0.001) / parameters.self_collision_proximity_threshold)
59  , scene_velocity_scale_coefficient_(-log(0.001) / parameters.scene_collision_proximity_threshold)
60  , period_(1. / parameters_.collision_check_rate)
61 {
62  // Init collision request
63  collision_request_.group_name = parameters_.move_group_name;
64  collision_request_.distance = true; // enable distance-based collision checking
65  collision_request_.contacts = true; // Record the names of collision pairs
66 
67  if (parameters_.collision_check_rate < MIN_RECOMMENDED_COLLISION_RATE)
68  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
69  "Collision check rate is low, increase it in yaml file if CPU allows");
70 
71  collision_check_type_ =
72  (parameters_.collision_check_type == "threshold_distance" ? K_THRESHOLD_DISTANCE : K_STOP_DISTANCE);
73  safety_factor_ = parameters_.collision_distance_safety_factor;
74 
75  // Internal namespace
76  ros::NodeHandle internal_nh(nh_, "internal");
77  collision_velocity_scale_pub_ = internal_nh.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("collision_velocity_scale", ROS_QUEUE_SIZE);
78  worst_case_stop_time_sub_ =
79  internal_nh.subscribe("worst_case_stop_time", ROS_QUEUE_SIZE, &CollisionCheck::worstCaseStopTimeCB, this);
80 
81  current_state_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState();
82  acm_ = getLockedPlanningSceneRO()->getAllowedCollisionMatrix();
83 }
84 
85 planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO CollisionCheck::getLockedPlanningSceneRO() const
86 {
87  return planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO(planning_scene_monitor_);
88 }
89 
90 void CollisionCheck::start()
91 {
92  timer_ = nh_.createTimer(period_, &CollisionCheck::run, this);
93 }
94 
95 void CollisionCheck::run(const ros::TimerEvent& timer_event)
96 {
97  // Log warning when the last loop duration was longer than the period
98  if (timer_event.profile.last_duration.toSec() > period_.toSec())
99  {
100  ROS_WARN_STREAM_THROTTLE_NAMED(ROS_LOG_THROTTLE_PERIOD, LOGNAME,
101  "last_duration: " << timer_event.profile.last_duration.toSec() << " ("
102  << period_.toSec() << ")");
103  }
104 
105  if (paused_)
106  {
107  return;
108  }
109 
110  // Update to the latest current state
111  current_state_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState();
112  current_state_->updateCollisionBodyTransforms();
113  collision_detected_ = false;
114 
115  // Do a timer-safe distance-based collision detection
116  collision_result_.clear();
117  getLockedPlanningSceneRO()->getCollisionEnv()->checkRobotCollision(collision_request_, collision_result_,
118  *current_state_);
119  scene_collision_distance_ = collision_result_.distance;
120  collision_detected_ |= collision_result_.collision;
121  collision_result_.print();
122 
123  collision_result_.clear();
124  // Self-collisions and scene collisions are checked separately so different thresholds can be used
125  getLockedPlanningSceneRO()->getCollisionEnvUnpadded()->checkSelfCollision(collision_request_, collision_result_,
126  *current_state_, acm_);
127  self_collision_distance_ = collision_result_.distance;
128  collision_detected_ |= collision_result_.collision;
129  collision_result_.print();
130 
131  velocity_scale_ = 1;
132  // If we're definitely in collision, stop immediately
133  if (collision_detected_)
134  {
135  velocity_scale_ = 0;
136  }
137  // If threshold distances were specified
138  else if (collision_check_type_ == K_THRESHOLD_DISTANCE)
139  {
140  // If we are far from a collision, velocity_scale should be 1.
141  // If we are very close to a collision, velocity_scale should be ~zero.
142  // When scene_collision_proximity_threshold is breached, start decelerating exponentially.
143  if (scene_collision_distance_ < parameters_.scene_collision_proximity_threshold)
144  {
145  // velocity_scale = e ^ k * (collision_distance - threshold)
146  // k = - ln(0.001) / collision_proximity_threshold
147  // velocity_scale should equal one when collision_distance is at collision_proximity_threshold.
148  // velocity_scale should equal 0.001 when collision_distance is at zero.
149  velocity_scale_ =
150  std::min(velocity_scale_, exp(scene_velocity_scale_coefficient_ *
151  (scene_collision_distance_ - parameters_.scene_collision_proximity_threshold)));
152  }
153 
154  if (self_collision_distance_ < parameters_.self_collision_proximity_threshold)
155  {
156  velocity_scale_ =
157  std::min(velocity_scale_, exp(self_velocity_scale_coefficient_ *
158  (self_collision_distance_ - parameters_.self_collision_proximity_threshold)));
159  }
160  }
161  // Else, we stop based on worst-case stopping distance
162  else
163  {
164  // Retrieve the worst-case time to stop, based on current joint velocities
165 
166  // Calculate rate of change of distance to nearest collision
167  current_collision_distance_ = std::min(scene_collision_distance_, self_collision_distance_);
168  derivative_of_collision_distance_ = (current_collision_distance_ - prev_collision_distance_) / period_.toSec();
169 
170  if (current_collision_distance_ < parameters_.min_allowable_collision_distance &&
171  derivative_of_collision_distance_ <= 0)
172  {
173  velocity_scale_ = 0;
174  }
175  // Only bother doing calculations if we are moving toward the nearest collision
176  else if (derivative_of_collision_distance_ < -EPSILON)
177  {
178  // At the rate the collision distance is decreasing, how long until we collide?
179  est_time_to_collision_ = fabs(current_collision_distance_ / derivative_of_collision_distance_);
180 
181  // halt if we can't stop fast enough (including the safety factor)
182  if (est_time_to_collision_ < (safety_factor_ * worst_case_stop_time_))
183  {
184  velocity_scale_ = 0;
185  }
186  }
187 
188  // Update for the next iteration
189  prev_collision_distance_ = current_collision_distance_;
190  }
191 
192  // publish message
193  {
194  auto msg = moveit::util::make_shared_from_pool<std_msgs::Float64>();
195  msg->data = velocity_scale_;
196  collision_velocity_scale_pub_.publish(msg);
197  }
198 }
199 
200 void CollisionCheck::worstCaseStopTimeCB(const std_msgs::Float64ConstPtr& msg)
201 {
202  worst_case_stop_time_ = msg->data;
203 }
204 
205 void CollisionCheck::setPaused(bool paused)
206 {
207  paused_ = paused;
208 }
